title: How has banking changed with mobile apps?

korean: 모바일 뱅킹이 나오면서 은행 업무가 정말 편해졌어요.
예전에는 이체 한 번 하려고 은행 가거나 ATM 찾아다녔거든요.
지금은 집에서 누워서도 다 할 수 있잖아요.
은행 앱으로 하면 수수료 무료인 경우가 많고.
지문 인식, 얼굴 인식, OTP 같은 걸로 안전하게 거래할 수 있고.
다만 나이 드신 분들은 사용하기 어려워하시는 것 같아요.
우리 부모님도 처음에 많이 헷갈려 하셨거든요.
english: Since mobile banking came out, banking has become really convenient.
In the past, you had to go to the bank or find an ATM just to make one transfer.
Now you can do everything while lying down at home, right?
It's possible 24 hours anytime, so it's really convenient.
Fees have also decreased a lot.
When you do it through the bank app, fees are often free.
Transfers to other banks are also free up to a certain number of times.
Security has been strengthened a lot too.
You can do transactions safely with fingerprint recognition, face recognition, OTP and stuff.
But it seems older people find it difficult to use.
My parents were very confused at first too, you know.
Overall, I think it's a really innovative change.
